name: Manendra Engineering
overview:
Established in year 1985, we, “Mahendra Engineering Company”, are a reputed organization that is engaged in manufacturing and supplying Pump Spares & Castings and Chemical Process Pumps. The range offered by us consists of Impeller Caps, Section Covers, Pump Bearing Sleeves, Chemical Process Pumps, Pump Castings and more. While manufacturing these products, our professionals strictly follow the established norms and standards of the industry. Along with this, a team of experts strictly monitors the production process at every stage so as to maintain highest quality standards and remove defects, if any.

Our Team: Supported by a team of experienced and talented professionals, we have been able to create a niche for ourselves in this domain. All the professionals appointed by us are masters of their respective field of work and have proven themselves over the years.

Our Infrastructure: We have developed a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility for ensuring smooth execution of various business processes. Our infrastructure is spread over a vast area and outfitted with advanced machines & tools, which enables us in conducting all our trade tasks under a single roof effectively.

Our Quality Assurance: Since our inception, we have been committed towards offering premium quality Pump Spares & Castings and Chemical Process Pumps to the clients. All our products are manufactured in accordance with the established guidelines of the industry by using high-grade material and employing advanced machines.

Our Products: Chemical Process Pumps

Pump Castings

Gear Pumps
